title: Integrated Use of Books and Social Media for Remote Education Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and remote learning experience
context.additional_context: Process of experiencing the role of books in VR simulation environments and social media-integrated learning activities

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of book content on knowledge acquisition in VR-based simulations
Learners can perform collaborative activities using social media platforms to critically discuss book-based learning content
Learners can propose complementary strategies for utilizing books and digital media in remote education environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
